announcements.title: Reminder: Levy Payment Due
announcements.content: All owners are reminded to ensure their monthly levies are paid by April 30th to avoid late fees. Thank you for your cooperation.

announcements.title: Committee Meeting Agenda
announcements.content: Committee members are requested to submit the final election form for the May general meeting by April 27th.

announcements.title: Holiday Decorations
announcements.content: All owners are welcome to decorate their buildings for the Easter holiday. Please ensure all decorations will not cause fire hazards.

announcements.title: New Security System
announcements.content: We are implementing a new security system for the building. All workers will need to register their key card by 1st of May.
